docs.title: Welcome to my page
docs.text:
Actually a student in computer science from Université Claude Bernard Lyon 1.

I'm in the master degrees specialised in Artificial Intelligence.

docs.title: Vision-grounded Integration for Reward design And Learning (VIRAL)
docs.text:
• This project aims to create a framework for reward function generation in Gymnasium environments, utilizing and VideoLLM in order to enchance aligment too. Below, you can see how the framework is structured.
  • We want to publish a demo for the ECAI conference.
  • repository github
  • mark: 15.9/20
  • date: December 2024 to May 2025
